titles.title: I Want A Principle Within (easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I want a principle within Of watchful godly fear A sensibility of sin A pain to feel it near Help me the first approach to feel Of pride or wrong desire To catch the wandering of my will And quench the kindling fire{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}From Thee that I no more may stray No more Thy goodness grieve Grant me the filial awe I pray The tender conscience give Quick as the apple of an eye O God my conscience make Awake my soul when sin is nigh And keep it still awake{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Almighty God of truth and love To me Thy power impart The burden from my soul remove The hardness from my heart O may the least omission pain My reawakened soul And drive me to that grace again Which makes the wounded whole{/lang-eng}
